file_content.text: Selling Trash
<<1>> wishes to speak with you in private.
<<1>> wishes to speak with you aboard your ship.
<<1>> is off selling your low-quality items.
<<1>> is currently deployed on a crew skill task.
Your companion has returned from selling your low-quality items with <<1>> credits.
Your companion has returned.
Your companion was dismissed because the group is full.
Your companion was dismissed at the group leader's request.
Your companion is away selling your low-quality items.
Open Crew Window
Group size limit reached. Companion has been dismissed.
Group size limit reached. You cannot summon your companion.
Companion Abilities
Toggle the companion ability bar.
Left-click abilities to activate.
Right-click abilities to toggle AI usage.
Your companion was dismissed because you joined an ops group.
You cannot summon your companion while in an ops group.
Companion
Work has been added to <<1>>'s crew skill queue.
Your companion has been dismissed due to entering companion free region
Companions can not be summoned in this region
Your companion cannot join you on this mission.
